summary: TrumpMaga47 Movement on the Blockchain - Introduced on January 29, 2024, TrumpMaga47 is a meme cryptocurrency token developed on the Ethereum Network by a United States-based team. It imposes a 1% tax on both buying and selling transactions, with the proceeds directed towards donations for Disabled American Veterans. Transparent records of various contributions will be shared on the project’s social media channels after enough trades have happened.
